price: Na mmom Amanehunu gya no kwan (na Ɔbεkyerε wͻn), emu na wͻ’bεtena afe bͻͻ. Ԑno yε adeε a εyε mmrε ma Nyankopͻn.
arabic: إِلَّا طَرِيقَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā ṭarīqa jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadan wakāna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīran
